tool_description: LangTranslate offers seamless and accurate language translation services for all your needs. Translate text instantly across multiple languages with ease.
name: LangTranslate: Your Ultimate Language Translation Tool
title: LangTranslate: Your Ultimate Language Translation Tool
tool_name: LangTranslate: Your Ultimate Language Translation Tool

api_list.name: get iso code
api_list.description: This api is used to get a list of available language iso codes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://langtranslate-your-ultimate-language-translation-tool.p.rapidapi.com/api/translate/iso-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "langtranslate-your-ultimate-language-translation-tool.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://langtranslate-your-ultimate-language-translation-tool.p.rapidapi.com/api/translate/iso-code"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "langtranslate-your-ultimate-language-translation-tool.p.rapidapi.com"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
